attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app I really did. I downloaded thinking by signing up I would be able to find the love of my life. Unfortunately the only person I saw on this app was a big orange Cheeto who was actually quite traumatizing. He kept saying things that were racist, homophobic, islamophobic, and xenophobic. Not to mention he keeps swiping on the profiles of younger ladies. I refuse to support the app of this racist rapist. Disgusting.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app took several days to download onto my phone after  downloaded onto my phone it started crashing then it wiped all of my data and then I had to restart my whole phone and I had to get all of my contacts back I would not recommend downloading this app because it is a waste of time and it will ruin your phone

attributes.review: I was trying to use this to do my research on his beliefs and opinions from an educational standpoint, and I feel like everything was just spam and then I couldn't figure out how to turn off the text alerts. It's just another way the Trump campaign is trying to overload citizens with information and biased and untruth about matters. Not fact based at all. 0/5 if that was possible.
